comments.author: markuskilas@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.04 (lucid) Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: NSS HEAD checked out from CVS 20110209

When verifying a normal DER encoded binary X.509 certificate (for instance the certificate of the issuer of mozilla.org) the verification fails after the certificate serial number has been printed out:
$ bin/checkcert ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der 
Certificate:
    Data:
        Version: 3 (0x2)
        Serial Number: 903804111 (0x35def4cf)
Assertion failure: oidhash != NULL, at secoid.c:2018
Aborted

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Checkout HEAD revisions of NSPR and NSS
2. cd to mozilla/security/nss and run (g)make nss_build_all and (g)make install
3. cd to mozilla/dist/Linux2.6_x86_glibc_PTH_DBG.OBJ/ and set LD_LIBRARY_PATH to ./lib
4. Run checkcert with a binary certificate:
$ bin/checkcert ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der
Actual Results:  
Certificate:
    Data:
        Version: 3 (0x2)
        Serial Number: 903804111 (0x35def4cf)
Assertion failure: oidhash != NULL, at secoid.c:2018
Aborted

Expected Results:  
All certificate data being printed out and without assertion faulures.
comments.creator: markuskilas@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.04 (lucid) Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: NSS HEAD checked out from CVS 20110209

When verifying a normal DER encoded binary X.509 certificate (for instance the certificate of the issuer of mozilla.org) the verification fails after the certificate serial number has been printed out:
$ bin/checkcert ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der 
Certificate:
    Data:
        Version: 3 (0x2)
        Serial Number: 903804111 (0x35def4cf)
Assertion failure: oidhash != NULL, at secoid.c:2018
Aborted

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Checkout HEAD revisions of NSPR and NSS
2. cd to mozilla/security/nss and run (g)make nss_build_all and (g)make install
3. cd to mozilla/dist/Linux2.6_x86_glibc_PTH_DBG.OBJ/ and set LD_LIBRARY_PATH to ./lib
4. Run checkcert with a binary certificate:
$ bin/checkcert ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der ~/Desktop/EquifaxSecureCA.der
Actual Results:  
Certificate:
    Data:
        Version: 3 (0x2)
        Serial Number: 903804111 (0x35def4cf)
Assertion failure: oidhash != NULL, at secoid.c:2018
Aborted

Expected Results:  
All certificate data being printed out and without assertion faulures.

comments.author: wtc@google.com
comments.creator: wtc@google.com
comments.text:
Thank you for the bug report.

checkcert hasn't been updated for a long time.  It is missing
the NSS initialization function required since NSS 3.2.

We can add an NSS_Init call to checkcert.c, but the tool
will still be out of date.
comments.raw_text:
Thank you for the bug report.

checkcert hasn't been updated for a long time.  It is missing
the NSS initialization function required since NSS 3.2.

We can add an NSS_Init call to checkcert.c, but the tool
will still be out of date.
